code_General.connections.postgresql.pgProfiles¶

Generic Backend

Silvio Weging 2023

static checkIfUserIsInOrganization(session=None, hashID='')¶

Check if a user is in an organization or not. Can be used to decide if additional code specific for orgas should be run

  • hashID (str) – The user ID

Returns:

static addUserIfNotExists(session, organization=None)¶

Add user if the entry doesn’t already exists.

Parameters:

  • session (Dictionary) – POST request session

  • organization (None) – Dummy object to comply to interface of function with same name from sister class

Returns:

Information about the user. Necessary to check if database entry is equal to callback information

Return type:

User Object

static updateContent(session, updates, userID='')¶

Update user details.

Parameters:

  • session (Dictionary) – GET request session

  • updates (differs) – The user details to update

  • userID (str) – The user ID who updates. If not given, the subID will be used

Returns:

If it worked or not

Return type:

None | Exception

  • updates (differs) – The user details to update

  • userID (str) – The user ID to update. If not given, the subID will be used

Returns:

If it worked or not

Return type:

None | Exception

  • session (Dictionary) – POST request session

  • typeOfOrganization (str) – type of the organization, can be: manufacturer, stakeholder

static updateContent(session, updates, orgaID='')¶

Update user details and more.

Parameters:

  • updates (differs) – The orga details to update

  • orgaID (str) – The orga ID who updates. If not given, the org_id will be used

Returns:

Worked or not

Return type:

None | Exception
